mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(m_pwd, m_name, m_phone, m_id, m_gender, m_birthdate, iron_distance, driver_distance, m_score) values(#{m_pwd}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_id}, #{m_gender}, #{m_birthdate}, #{iron_distance}, #{driver_distance}, #{m_score})
mapper.select: select m_name from tbl_member where m_id = #{m_id}
select * from tbl_member where m_id = #{m_id} and m_pwd = #{m_pwd}
